title: Trimming, 1943-46-54, early 19th century
medium: Black, red, white, and yellow silk in uncut voided velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Two shields, each topped with plume helmet, one showing a castle, and the other, horizontal bars. Colors are black, red, and white on yellow ground.
